name: Up Shore (varunraj)
description:
Up Shore is a 2D puzzle platformer where you play as a Mermaid and little Girl. The concept of the game was built around 'water' which was the theme for 'Summer GameJam' on Itch.

- Make use of the Mermaid's water levitation abilities to help her friend across or reach higher locations.

- Piece together what happened in the world as a lot of the game's story was built with current events relating to water scarcity.

The game was built in a span of two weeks by a team of different backgrounds during their free time.

Fixc.itch.io - Art
Furozo.itch.io - Audio
Hitagi.itch.io - Code
NeonPastelColor.itch.io - Audio
